name: Samuel Wakoli
bio: I am a self-taught full-stack software developer with over three years of specialized experience in mobile application development, proficient in Flutter and native Android development using Kotlin as my primary programming language, complemented by expertise in Dart and JavaScript. My technical stack encompasses Jetpack Compose for Android front-end development and Flutter for cross-platform solutions, while leveraging Firebase and Google Cloud Platform for robust back-end infrastructure.

experience.description: Engineered responsive Flutter applications with unified codebases. Implemented comprehensive backend solutions using Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Cloud Functions). Integrated Stripe for payments and Google's Gemini AI for resume summaries. Led architecture planning and provided technical leadership on Flutter best practices.

Built feature-rich Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. Integrated Firebase Realtime Database for offline-first experiences. Migrated legacy XML layouts to Jetpack Compose. Implemented secure multi-factor authentication and background processing with WorkManager.
